name: Cranberry Bites
description: Cranberry sauce isn’t just for turkey! It makes a flavourful finisher for creamy, brie-topped crostini too.
preparation: Combine oil with Sage & Apple Stuffing Seasoning.
Using a basting brush, lightly brush oil mixture on baguette slices. Place on a Sheet Pan. Bake until crisp and fragrant, approximately 5 minutes. Let cool.
Just before serving, slice cheese into 16 pieces. Arrange toasted slices on a serving platter. Top each with a piece of cheese and a dollop of cranberry sauce.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
